text.__SUMMARY__: Odostomia disparilis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pyramidellidae, the pyrams and their allies.
text.Description: The shell of this micromollusc grows to a length of 3.2 mm.
text.Distribution:
This species occurs in the following locations:
Northwest Atlantic off North Carolina, USA
text.Notes:
Additional information regarding this species:
Distribution: off Cape Hatteras, N.C.
